path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Solidity_Finance/Premia Finance - Solidity Finance Smart Contract Audit.pdf

findings.title: Investing requires placing trust in the project team as they have substantial power in the ecosystem
findings.description: The project team has substantial power in the ecosystem and can upgrade many of the platform's contracts and update other critical variables, requiring users to place trust in them.

findings.title: Upgradeability of Contracts
findings.description: The project team has substantial power to upgrade many contracts and update critical variables.
